original_text: As yet shall he remain at Nob that day: he shall shake his hand against the mount of the daughter of Zion, the hill of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 아직 이 날에 그가 놉에서 쉬고 딸 시온 산 곧 예루살렘 산을 향하여 그 손을 흔들리로다

sentences.original_text: As yet shall he remain at Nob that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날 그는 아직 놉에 머물 것이다

sentences.original_text: against the mount of the daughter of Zion
